cast.name: Lance J. Holt Lance J. Holt

writer.name: 斯图尔特·埃利奥特 Stuart Elliott

director.name: 斯图尔特·埃利奥特 Stuart Elliott

trans_title: 失落的世界 第一季
introduction: Explore the past rebuilt in stunning detail. This stunning collection fulfils every explorer’s fantasy: the chance to walk the living streets of great cities now lost to time. Experience crucial moments in history where they actually occurred.Lost Worlds journeys through time to relive some of the most crucial events in world history within the walls where they occurred. In each revealing episode, discover secrets of the past with a team of historical detectives using evidence from recent excavations, state-of-the-art scientific studies and historical documents. History comes alive before your eyes.This series has broken new ground in presenting the past with living, breathing immediacy. From the historic--Palenque, Egypt, Scotland--to the fantastic--Atlantis, Dracula, Hitler’s Supercity--Lost Worlds brings the breadth of human ambition and experience to life. This series, like none other, compellingly places events into their original context and gives the viewer a unique “you-are-there” perspective.
chinese_title: 失落的世界 第一季
